QuestData.Title: That's No Pyramid!
QuestData.Description: That pyramid at the Maker's Terrace in Uldum is nothing of the sort. It's a giant machine that can be reconfigured for any number of uses.$B$BDeathwing was going to have the Twilight's Hammer turn it into a massive weapon!$B$B$n, you have to take the portal to get this information to Belloc Brightblade at Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar. He'll know what to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Belloc Brightblade at Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.RewardText: Uldum? What about Uldum? Speak quickly!
